revised_title: The Discovery and Analysis of Lepidocarpon, a Fossil Plant from Palaeozoic Rocks
tldr: The author examines the structure and affinities of fossil plants from Palaeozoic rocks, specifically focusing on the seed-like fructification of Lepidocarpon, a genus of lycopodiaceous cones from the Carboniferous formation. The discovery of this fructification challenges previous understanding of seed-bearing plants and sheds light on their evolutionary history.
